subject: Re: [junit] Is it really neccessery to use Junit with some kind of IDE ?
msgSnippet: Simon, The build machines that you talk about, in a continuous integration environment or not, pull the code to build from the source control system.
messageBody:
Simon,

The build machines that you talk about, in a continuous integration
environment or not, pull the code to build from the source control system.
Therefore, the developers need to check in the code before a build can
happen. And a developer checks in the code only if all the tests succesfully
completes. Therefore, if you cannot or you don't run all your unit tests on
your workstation, you cannot check in the code that you're working on.

Regards,

- Yagiz -


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
